name: SportsBlock
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to weekly updates from The Sports Block. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

The Sports Block is a high school sports broadcast made by students for the Middle Creek High School community.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
